alert.note: Alert for Butler; Muhlenberg; Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 7:13PM EST until January 14 at 2:43PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Rochester affecting Butler, Ohio and Muhlenberg Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Rochester. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon to early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Rochester Ferry stops operation. At 17.0 feet, Reeds and Rochester Ferries remain closed. KY 369 floods one mile north of Rochester. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 PM CST Sunday the stage was 15.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 18.9 feet Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued tomorrow.
